title: Two Turtles Acupuncture Center | Improve Your Quality of Life
description: Our goal is to bring compassion and insight to every treatment, and help you become more aware of your natural ability to heal and be joy-filled.
cleaned_text: Improve Your Quality of Life Meet Jen DeMaio I've been providing holistic health services to the Fargo Moorhead Community since 2003. I bring together the ancient wisdom of Chinese Medicine, Ayurveda and Yoga Philosophy to help you thrive in a modern world. My goal is to bring compassion and insight to every treatment, and help you become more aware of your natural ability to heal and be joy-filled. Yoga Schedule Join us Saturdays at 9 a.m. for a refreshing and energizing 75 minute yoga session. Classes will be held virtually. We welcome all levels and experience and remind you that this is your practice. [Click here to learn more](/yoga-classes) or email [info@twoturtlesacupuncture.com](mailto:info@twoturtlesacupuncture.com) to join virtually.
